# <a name="print-email-calendars-and-attachments"></a><span data-ttu-id="be29e-102">列印電子郵件、行事曆和附件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-102">Print email, calendars, and attachments</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be29e-103">若要在 Outlook 網頁版中列印電子郵件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-103">To print an email message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="be29e-104">選取您要列印的郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="be29e-105">在郵件的右上角，選取三個點，然後選取 [ **列印**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots and then select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be29e-106">若要列印您的行事曆：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-106">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="be29e-107">在頁面的右上角，選取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-107">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="be29e-108">**列印**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-108">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="be29e-109">選擇 [視圖] 和 [時間範圍]，然後選取 [ **列印**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-109">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be29e-110">若要列印附件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-110">To print an attachment:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="be29e-111">開啟包含您要列印之附件的郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-111">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="be29e-112">將游標移到附件上，然後選取 **下載** 圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-112">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **Download** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="be29e-113">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-113">.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="be29e-114">下載檔案後，以適當的程式開啟檔案，然後選擇要列印的選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-114">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be29e-115">例如，在 Word 中開啟 .doc 檔，然後列印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-115">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be29e-116">若要深入瞭解，請參閱 [在 Outlook 網頁版中列印電子郵件訊息、附件和行事曆](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be29e-116">To learn more, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span></span>
